name: Snow Battle Princess SAYUKI | 雪ん娘大旋風
description: Sayuki, a cute and powerful snow goddess is on a quest to save her beloved human boy, from the evil curse of the demon! An exciting, retro style, scrolling shooter. Go to the world of Japanese myth!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows 8 プロセッサー: Intel 1.3GHz メモリー: 1 GB RAM グラフィック: intel HD Graphics with 1GB of VRAM or comparable DirectX: Version 11 ストレージ: 330 MB 利用可能 サウンドカード: Windows compatible sound card
